data.title: Inside The All-New Lake Charles Urban Air Adventure Park
data.meta_description: Here's your chance to see inside Urban Air Adventure Park. Get membership details and find out how to sign up!
data.text:
The wait is almost over! Southwest Louisiana kids are gonna flip when the all-new Urban Air Adventure Park opens its doors. Located at the corner of Ryan St. and Sale Rd., next door to Planet Fitness across from McNeese State University at 4070 Ryan St., Lake Charles, Louisiana.

Take advantage of these Endless Play Urban Air Membership benefits:

Up to 85% Savings

Receive over $2300 of Value when you purchase a membership.

Unlimited Visits - Come as many times as youâ€™d like for one low monthly price!

VIP Treatment - Get the VIP Treatment with every visit when you have a membership.

The exciting indoor entertainment complex has enough amazing attractions inside to keep the whole family busy for hours! Get ready to jump, and soar from the Spin Flip Zone to the thrilling go-kart race course.

Join the Urban Air team and be close to the action daily. Can you think of a more exciting place to work? You're in luck because they are hiring right now. Apply here to work and play at the coolest place in Lake Charles!

The Grand Opening event is just around the corner. Mayor Nic Hunter stopped by today and got a chance to meet with the Lake Charles Urban Air Adventure Park team. For months construction crews have been hard at work making sure every attraction in the all-new indoor entertainment complex is in place and ready to go.

As the grand opening day nears, Mayor Hunter stopped by for a sneak peek. Here's how it went.

After you get all strapped up, it's time to jump, flip, dive, glide, ride, climb, and soar! Let the countdown to non-stop FUN begin!
